item.title: 智利总统候选人卡斯特承诺鼓励投资
item.description: 智利右翼总统候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（Jose Antonio Kast）在其政府计划中承诺，将取消对部分股票销售征收的资本利得税，并刺激投资以推动经济增长。【原文：Chile right-wing presidential candidate Jose Antonio Kast pledged to scrap a capital gains tax on some stock sales and spur investment to propel economic growth, according to the front-runner’s government plan.】

item.title: 欧盟认为即使没有主权地位，其债券市场也将不断发展
item.description: 尽管欧盟加入主权债务指数的努力至今未果，但欧盟仍希望其债券市场能通过进一步的发行计划和期货合约继续发展。【原文：The European Union expects its bond market to continue to develop with further issuance programs and futures contracts, even though its push to join sovereign debt indexes has failed so far.】

item.title: 医疗补助削减 "摧毁 "了农村医院的融资选择
item.description: 哥伦比亚 Threadneedle 投资公司称，唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "美丽大法案 "中通过的医疗补助削减措施可能会将乡村医院系统挤出市政债券市场。【原文：The Medicaid cuts passed in President Donald Trump’s “Big Beautiful Bill” could push rural hospital systems out of the municipal bond market, according to Columbia Threadneedle Investments.】

item.title: 瑞典检察官撤销对 Alecta 公司调查中的两项贿赂指控
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的官方文件，负责调查 Alecta 公司的瑞典检察官撤销了对该养老基金的两项所谓严重贿赂指控。【原文：Swedish prosecutors probing Alecta have dropped two counts of so-called aggravated bribery against the pension fund, according to official documents seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 碧桂园警告上半年亏损可能扩大至 30 亿美元
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司称其上半年亏损可能高达 30 亿美元，中国旷日持久的房地产危机继续拖累这家陷入困境的开发商。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. said its first-half loss could reach as high as $3 billion with the China’s prolonged property crisis continuing to weigh on the the embattled developer.】

item.title: 华尔街从鲍威尔那里获得其所期待的反弹信号
item.description: 在本月的大部分时间里，华尔街的交易员们纷纷涌入股票和债券市场，押注美联储终于准备好再次降息。他们所等待的只是杰罗姆-鲍威尔开绿灯，让涨势继续下去。【原文：For much of this month, Wall Street traders piled into stocks and bonds, betting that the Federal Reserve was finally ready to start cutting interest rates again. All they were waiting on was the green light from Jerome Powell to keep the rally going.】

item.title: Spirit 借现金降低违约风险后评级被下调
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）的信用等级下调两级，降至 Caa3，此前这家陷入困境的航空公司已从其循环信贷机制中提取了 2.75 亿美元，以避免现金短缺。【原文：Moody’s Ratings downgraded the creditworthiness of Spirit Airlines by two notches, to Caa3, after the beleaguered airline drew down $275 million of its revolving credit facility to avert a cash crunch.】

item.title: 矿山被查封后阿联酋全球铝业公司将撤离几内亚
item.description: 阿联酋全球铝业公司（Emirates Global Aluminium）表示，在几内亚的铝土矿被政府征用后，该公司在几内亚的铝土矿开采业务将终止。【原文：Emirates Global Aluminium said its bauxite mining operations in Guinea will be brought to an end after its mine was expropriated by the government.】

item.title: 安抚市场的智利财政部长意外离职令交易员大跌眼镜
item.description: 前财政部长马里奥-马塞尔（Mario Marcel）帮助将智利的风险意识降至多年来的最低水平，这对于一个原本打算彻底改革智利自由市场经济并支持重写宪法的政府来说并非易事。他周四的意外辞职令交易员们感到震惊。【原文：Former Finance Minister Mario Marcel helped reduce the perception of risk in Chile to the lowest level in years, no mean feat in a government that originally intended to overhaul the country’s free-market economy and backed a rewrite of the constitution. His surprise resignation Thursday jolted traders.】

item.title: 事故影响经济复苏，Codelco 下调铜矿指导价格
item.description: Codelco 公司下调了生产指标，因为其最大矿山发生的致命事故阻碍了该公司从矿石质量恶化中恢复的努力，损害了该公司继续保持世界顶级铜供应商地位的机会。【原文：Codelco lowered its production guidance after a fatal accident at its biggest mine hindered efforts to recover from deteriorating ore quality, hurting the company’s chances of remaining as the world’s top copper supplier.】

item.title: 美国银行股因降息押注而创下三年来首个纪录
item.description: 在投资者猜测美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出下月降息的信号后，美国银行股的一个重要指标创下了自2022年1月以来的首个收盘纪录。【原文：A key gauge of US bank stocks headed for its first record close since January 2022, with the latest leg higher coming after investors speculated Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled a willingness to cut rates next month.】

item.title: IndiGo 和 Max Healthcare 将加入印度基准 Nifty 指数
item.description: 印度的顶级证券交易所将于 9 月底把该国第一大航空公司和市值最高的连锁医院纳入其基准指数。【原文：India’s top bourse will add the country’s number one airline company and the most valuable hospital chain by market capitalization to its benchmark index at the end of September.】

item.title: 加拿大将放弃多项报复性关税，向特朗普伸出橄榄枝
item.description: 加拿大将取消对一长串符合现有北美贸易协定的美国产品征收报复性关税，以缓和与白宫的紧张关系。【原文：Canada will remove its retaliatory tariffs on a long list of US products that comply with the existing North American trade deal, seeking to lower tensions with the White House.】

item.title: 图片显示：无人机袭击后俄罗斯氦气场仍完好无损
item.description: 卫星图像显示，一个为俄罗斯军火和航空航天工业生产氦气的基地在上周遭到乌克兰无人机袭击后似乎基本完好无损。【原文：A site that produces helium for Russia’s arms and aerospace industries appears to be largely intact following a Ukranian drone attack last week, satellite imagery shows.】

item.title: Visa 放弃美国开放银行业务，数据访问争论不休
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Visa 公司关闭了其在美国的开放式银行业务，原因是消费者数据权利方面的监管不确定性，以及客户信息可能需要支付更高的费用。【原文：Visa Inc. shut its open-banking business in the US amid regulatory uncertainty about consumer-data rights and the prospect of higher fees for customer information, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 鲍威尔称风险可能成为调整利率的理由，国债跳涨
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示可能有必要降息以支持劳动力市场后，国债飙升，交易员也增加了对 9 月份降息的押注。【原文：Treasuries soared and traders added to bets on a September interest-rate cut after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell indicated a reduction may be warranted to support the labor market.】

item.title: 刚果新任中央银行行长希望使刚果摆脱美元依赖
item.description: 刚果民主共和国新任央行行长的使命是恢复人们对该国货币的信心，减少对美元的依赖，因为该国近 90% 的国内交易都使用美元。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo’s new central bank governor is on a mission to restore faith in the nation’s currency and reduce its reliance on the US dollar, which is used for nearly 90% of domestic transactions.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长纳格尔称再次降息的 "门槛很高
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，经济前景需要发生重大转变，欧洲央行才会再次降低借贷成本。【原文：The economic outlook would need to shift significantly for the European Central Bank to lower borrowing costs again, according to Governing Council member Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔杰克逊霍尔演讲的主要观点
item.description: 以下是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五在堪萨斯城联储经济研讨会上的发言要点：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s prepared remarks at the Kansas City Fed’s economic symposium on Friday:】

item.title: 鲍威尔称风险变化可能需要调整利率
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）小心翼翼地打开了 9 月份降息的大门，指出劳动力市场的风险正在上升，即使对通胀的担忧依然存在。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell carefully opened the door to an interest-rate cut in September, pointing to rising risks for the labor market even as worries over inflation remain.】

item.title: 美联储主席鲍威尔周五在杰克逊霍尔发表讲话（全文）
item.description: 以下是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周五在怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔发表的题为 "货币政策与美联储框架审查 "的讲话稿的重新格式化版本：【原文：The following is a reformatted version of prepared remarks titled “Monetary Policy and the Fed’s Framework Review,” which Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell is delivering Friday in Jackson Hole, Wyoming:】

item.title: 股市连跌五日后走高，焦点转向鲍威尔
item.description: 美国股市在连续五天下跌后周五开盘上涨，交易员们在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的重要讲话。【原文：US equities rose at the open on Friday after five days of losses, as traders braced for a crucial speech by Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell that’s expected to offer near-term direction on the path of interest rates.】

item.title: 因预期收入下降，Worldline 被 S&P 下调为 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: Worldline SA 失去了 S&P Global Ratings 的投资级评级，给这家法国支付公司带来了新的挑战。【原文：Worldline SA has lost its investment grade rating from S&P Global Ratings, posing a fresh challenge for the French payments firm.】

item.title: 需求激增，顶级涡轮机制造商金风科技利润攀升
item.description: 中国的金风科技股份有限公司是全球最大的风力涡轮机制造商，由于国内需求激增，该公司今年上半年的利润攀升。【原文：China’s Goldwind Science & Technology Co., the world’s largest wind-turbine maker, saw profits climb in the first half of the year after a surge in domestic demand.】

item.title: 近期连胜 "不合理"，蓝湾短线受挫
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）押注反对英镑，称英镑近期的超额收益 "不合理"，因为该货币仍然容易受到英国政治和经济风险的影响。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management is betting against the pound, calling its recent outperformance “unjustified” as the currency remains vulnerable to UK political and economic risks.】

item.title: 协助特朗普打击美联储，普尔特重获 MAGA 英雄地位
item.description:
总统支持美国联邦住房与金融管理局（FHFA）局长要求对美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）涉嫌抵押贷款欺诈进行调查的呼吁

。【原文：

The president endorsed the FHFA chief’s call for a probe into Fed Governor Lisa Cook over alleged mortgage fraud

】

item.title: 加拿大消费者支出下滑，7 月销售额下降
item.description: 加拿大零售销售在第二季度表现疲软后将出现下滑，这反映出贸易不确定性增加和人口增长放缓导致消费支出放缓。【原文：Canadian retail sales are set to decline after a weak second quarter, capturing a slowdown in consumption spending amid elevated trade uncertainty and slowing population growth.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀低于预期，墨西哥银行放缓宽松政策
item.description: 墨西哥中央银行在上个月的利率会议上放慢了宽松步伐，此后墨西哥年度通货膨胀率的增幅大大低于预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation rate rose much less than expected after the central bank slowed the pace of easing at its interest rate meeting last month.】

item.title: 美元期权信号走强，因鲍威尔不会偏向鸽派
item.description: 由于交易商押注美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）不会在降息问题上采取过于鸽派的立场，货币期权显示出三周以来最强烈的看涨美元情绪。【原文：Currency options pointed to the most bullish sentiment on the dollar in three weeks as traders bet Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell won’t take an overly dovish stance on interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 尽管面临关税威胁，墨西哥经济仍实现季度增长
item.description: 墨西哥第二季度经济增长符合预期，央行延长了降息周期，以促进面临全球贸易波动等不利因素的经济活动。【原文：Mexico’s economy grew in line with expectations in the second quarter as central bankers extend a cycle of interest rate cuts to bolster activity that’s facing headwinds including global trade volatility.】
